bukkitrunnablehelper.handlers

Class TimedRepeatableHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable
      • bukkitrunnablehelper.handlers.PlannableHandler
        • bukkitrunnablehelper.handlers.RepeatableHandler
          • bukkitrunnablehelper.handlers.TimedRepeatableHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TimedRepeatableHandler
extends RepeatableHandler
    TimedRepeatableHandler extends a RepeatableHandler and handles the scheduling of a TimedRepeatable class. Every Repeatable.getDelayTicks() ticks, the Repeatable.repeat() is called until TimedRepeatable.getRemainingTicks() is smaller or equal to zero.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class bukkitrunnablehelper.handlers.PlannableHandler

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        This method is called every "Repeatable.getDelayTicks()" ticks. If TimedRepeatable.getRemainingTicks() is smaller or equal to zero this method will call Repeatable.repeat(). Else this method will call Plannable.timeout() and the Plannable will be cancelled through PlannableHandler.cancel().
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class RepeatableHandler
